title: League of Legends (TM) Client:Not responding
body:
Hello,so I been having this problem for a long time now and i know other summoners have it too.
So 3 out of 5 times i get on a game ill have  a freeze at the champion loading screen but thats probably my internets fault.But the other main problem is that after 10 -15 min while playing it will freeze and i cant alt+tab or i cant click anything ( escape,alt+f4) and i can hear the music and the abilities sounds but thats it.I have tried to leave it and un-freeze for like 1-2 hours and nothing happened.Its kinda anoying and ill have to ctr+alt+del and to restart my laptop and when i finally reconect 5-10 min will have passed and i hate it because my teamates blame me for being afk and that stuff but they are not wrong.So i will give my laptop info 

Laptop:Msi 
Windows 10 
Processor: Intel Core i7 CPU:2.60GHz
Ram:8 GB
64 bit.
Graphics Card:NVIDIA GTX960M
My laptop is under 1 year (5 months)

Any help will do:) 

                                    Thanks.

replies.body: This freezing really sucks. :(  Your best right now is to stop queuing into matchmade games until this is resolved.  This freezing has been known to happen to some players after updating Windows 10.  Specifically, the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) seems to auto-enable, which can cause this.  Disabling it should fix this up, but it's really important you test that in a custom game.

The brand specifically?  Not really.  You could always have outdated drivers too or something else entirely.  If the above steps don't work, try out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide as well to make sure everything is in good health with your pc.
Thank you so much! I dont have this problem now:)
I will try it thanks:) and also that was a fast respond :p
Also to add onto what he said. You have a dedicated GPU, check the GeForce Experiance app for a driver update =)
Yes i always update my drivers so thats not a problem :)
